column1: catherine reed thompson| catherine reed thompson (november 15
column3: 2015) send sympathy card catherine reed thompson passed away peacefully
column4: surrounded by her family at mercy hospital
column5: rogers ar at the age of 91. she was preceded in death by her husband of 56 years
column6: howard g thompson and eldest daughter patricia. catherine is survived by her children howard thompson
column7: jr and wife robin and nancy thompson all of claremore
column10: az and linda and husband dan naughton of lombard
column11: il. her grandchildren are catherine jean thompson
column13: matthew and david naughton. she was born on november 15
column16: mi to george and flora heartwell. catherine graduated from wayne state university. after her marriage to howard they lived in livonia
column18: and then relocated to downers grove
column19: il. upon howards retirement in 1986 they settled in shell knob
column20: mo. catherine and howard enjoyed the many visits by family to their table rock lake home. besides spending time with her family her favorite pass times were needlework
column21: reading suspense novels and playing bridge with her friends. in her lifetime she traveled to all 50 states and to europe. she supported the local boys ranch and was an active member of central community united methodist church. funeral services will be held at 11:00 a. m. tuesday
column24: in central community united methodist church
column25: under direction of fohn funeral home
column27: missouri. catherine will be laid to rest next to howard and patricia in ridgeville cemetery near amity
column28: mo on wednesday at 10:00 a. m. the family will receive friends from 5:00 until 7:00 p. m. monday
